title: Lost rp
body:
i bought some RP from the store and I didn't recieve it. (Im 3 minutes ago im see store rp is down)
Riot can restore my RP?

replies.body:
If you still haven't seen the RP credited to your account by now, I recommend reaching out in a [**support ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so one of our billing specialists can work with you to sort this out.

If you have any questions, let me know.
